document.full_text: conservative sarah palin returned to the u.s. political arena on saturday after several months absence with a feisty speech attacking both the establishment republican party and democratic president barack obama and proclaiming "the 2012 elections begin here."
document.title: palin returns with feisty, anti-establishment speech
lines_and_colors: conservative sarah palin returned to the u.s. political arena on saturday after several months absence with a feisty speech attacking both the establishment republican party and democratic president barack obama and proclaiming "the 2012 elections begin here."
